verses.verse: When Israel <WH3478> went forth out <WH3318> of Egypt, <WH4714> the house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290> from a people <WH5971> of foreign language; <WH3937>
Judah <WH3063> became his sanctuary, <WH6944> Israel <WH3478> his dominion. <WH4475>
The sea <WH3220> saw <WH7200> it, <WH5127> and fled. The Jordan <WH3383> was driven <WH5437> back. <WH268>
The mountains <WH2022> skipped <WH7540> like rams, <WH352> the little hills <WH1389> like lambs. <WH1121>
What was it, <WH3220> you sea, that you fled? <WH5127> You Jordan, <WH3383> that you turned <WH5437> back? <WH268>
You mountains, <WH2022> that you skipped <WH7540> like rams; <WH352> you little hills, <WH1389> like lambs? <WH1121>
Tremble, <WH2342> you earth, <WH776> at the presence <WH6440> of the Lord, <WH113> at the presence <WH6440> of the God <WH433> of Jacob, <WH3290>
who turned <WH2015> the rock <WH6697> into a pool <WH98> of water, <WH4325> the flint <WH2496> into a spring <WH4599> of waters. <WH4325>
